There are more planes in the sea than ships in the air. ✈️🌊
Bananas are berries, but strawberries are not. 🍌🍓
Honey never spoils. Archeologists have found pots of honey over 3,000 years old. 🍯⏳
Wombat poop is cube-shaped. 🐾🧊
Octopuses have three hearts. 🐙❤️❤️❤️
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus. 🌞🪐
Sharks existed before trees. 🦈🌳
Hot water freezes faster than cold water, known as the Mpemba effect. 🔥❄️
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller during the summer. 🗼☀️
Penguins propose to their mates with pebbles. 🐧💍
Humans and giraffes have the same number of neck vertebrae. 🦒👤
Butterflies taste with their feet. 🦋👣
The moon has moonquakes, similar to earthquakes on Earth. 🌕🌍
Koalas sleep up to 22 hours a day. 🐨💤
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'. 🦩✨
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins. 🦥🐬
Apples float because they are 25% air. 🍏💨
Pineapples take two years to grow. 🍍⏳
The average person spends six months of their life waiting for red lights to turn green. 🚦⏱️
Kangaroos can't walk backwards. 🦘🔄
The heart of a blue whale is as big as a car. 🐋🚗
Dolphins have names for each other. 🐬🗣️
A group of crows is called a murder. 🦅💀
Horses and cows can sleep standing up, but only horses can sleep while standing. 🐴🐄💤
Polar bears have black skin under their white fur. 🐻‍❄️⚫
An ostrich's eye is bigger than its brain. 🦩👁️🧠
Jellyfish are 95% water. 🐙💧
Cows have best friends and get stressed when separated. 🐄❤️👯‍♂️
The longest hiccuping spree lasted 68 years. 🤭⏳
Sea otters hold hands while sleeping to keep from drifting apart. 🦦🤝💤
A bolt of lightning contains enough energy to toast 100,000 slices of bread. ⚡🍞🔥
Cleopatra lived closer to the invention of the iPhone than the construction of the Great Pyramid. 👑📱🏺
A small child could swim through the veins of a blue whale. 👶🐋🏊‍♂️
Some cats are allergic to humans. 🐱🤧
A shrimp's heart is located in its head. 🍤🧠
Banging your head against a wall for one hour burns 150 calories. 🧠💥🔥
Snails can sleep for up to three years at a time. 🐌💤⏳
In Switzerland, it is illegal to own just one guinea pig. 🇨🇭🐹🚫
Humans share 50% of their DNA with bananas. 🧬🍌
Octopuses can change color and texture to blend in with their surroundings. 🎨🐙
Butterflies can see ultraviolet light. 🦋🌈
A group of jellyfish is called a bloom. 🌊🐙
Crows are known to use tools, such as sticks, to obtain food. 🦅🛠️
The shortest war in history was between Britain and Zanzibar on August 27, 1896. ⏳⚔️
The world's largest desert is Antarctica. 🏜️❄️
A bolt of lightning is five times hotter than the surface of the sun. ⚡☀️🔥
Honeybees can recognize human faces. 🐝👤
An octopus has nine brains: one central brain and one for each arm. 🐙🧠
Tigers have striped skin, not just striped fur. 🐅🎨
You can hear a blue whale's heartbeat from over two miles away. 🐋❤️🔊
